title: Королі палат
overview: Taras and Yehor are brothers and doctors in the city polyclinic. Yehor is a macho, and a successful surgeon. His wallet attracts all the girls, but the man wants to find true love. Taras is his exact opposite; he does not have enough money, neither he faces a promotion. Moreover, he should care for his wife and children. Every time the guys make fun of each other and conduct genuine laughter sessions! Throw away your daily routine and enjoy humor from the doctors.
